alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 11:44AM PST until February 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Northeastern Mendocino Interior and Northern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County
